name: six-hats
description: Edward de Bono's Six Thinking Hats framework - comprehensive decision-making with 6 perspectives

personas.prompt_template:
Analyze this proposal objectively using only facts, data, and precedents. What do we KNOW? What do we NOT know? Cite evidence:

{proposal}

What does your gut say about this? What feels wrong? What are the warning signs and hidden risks?

{proposal}

Attack this proposal. What are the weaknesses? Why will this fail? Be brutally critical:

{proposal}

What are the benefits and opportunities? What's the best-case scenario? What value does this create?

{proposal}

What else could we do instead? What are creative alternatives? What's the innovative approach?

{proposal}
